query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS loi_signups (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  ecosystem VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL CHECK (ecosystem IN ('jobs_training', 'enterprise', 'early_adopters')),
  source VARCHAR(500),
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  converted BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  converted_at TIMESTAMP,
  conversion_value DECIMAL(10,2)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3VC7xi4RHX81jG7.65112bc774d1 --database K34VNBtbDJyjtW8qhrCBdB --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS loi_signups (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  ecosystem VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL CHECK (ecosystem IN ('jobs_training', 'enterprise', 'early_adopters')),
  source VARCHAR(500),
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  converted BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  converted_at TIMESTAMP,
  conversion_value DECIMAL(10,2)
);
